mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER ( USER_ID, USER_ID_EMAIL, USER_PWD, USER_NAME_KR, USER_PHONE, USER_ADDRESS, USER_ADDRESS_DETAIL ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{email}, #{password}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{zipcode}, #{detailAddress} )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) > 0 FROM USER WHERE USER_ID_EMAIL = #{email}

SELECT USER_ID_EMAIL AS email, USER_PWD AS password, USER_ID AS userId, USER_POINT AS bonusPoint, USER_NAME_KR AS userName, USER_ADDRESS AS userAddress, USER_ADDRESS_DETAIL AS userAddressDetail, USER_PHONE AS userPhone FROM USER WHERE USER_ID_EMAIL = #{email}
